title: Green herb sauce
ingredients: ['150g mixed fresh herbs: parsley, chives, chervil, watercress (or alfalfa), pimpernel, sorrel, borage, tarragon and lemon balm', '50ml vegetable oil', '4 hard-boiled eggs', '250g plain yoghurt', '3 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', 'salt and pepper to taste']
